CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains warm-up task to MOT and leaves the room
MOT and CHI are sitting down on floor . CHI is holding a ball and has her back to the camera
CHI sits on the floor holding the football
MOT moves CHI a little to the left
<bef> MOT moves a book and sits down in front of CHI
MOT looks at CHI while holding her hand out
CHI looks at ball then at MOT
<aft> MOT turns toy truck next to her around so its front is facing CHI
MOT pushes truck towards and in between CHI's legs twice pretending to drive
CHI follows truck with her eyes
<bef> MOT places car between her and CHI
MOT moves hand back in lap
CHI looks at truck for a moment then at ball
CHI leans over and pulls truck towards her
MOT picks up the jack+in+the+box and puts it down on floor next to her knee
MOT picks up the toy duck
MOT holds duck up in front of CHI
<bef> MOT moves duck towards CHI's face . MOT squeezes duck right before it reaches CHI's nose . <aft> MOT pulls duck back
<bef> MOT moves duck towards CHI's face . MOT squeezes duck right before it reaches CHI's nose . <aft> MOT pulls duck away
CHI follows duck with her eyes
<bef> MOT moves duck towards CHI's face . MOT squeezes duck right before it reaches CHI's nose . <aft> MOT pulls hand back
MOT holds duck out in front of CHI and squeezes it
CHI looks at duck in her hand
<aft> CHI puts duck in her mouth
CHI looks at duck on floor
CHI puts tip of ball to her mouth with both hands then looks at it for a second and puts tip of it in her mouth again
<bef> CHI takes ball out of mouth
CHI turns her head towards door
noises from people walking and talking in the hallway are heard
MOT turns her head towards door
CHI turns her head and looks at MOT
MOT turns head then looks at CHI and opens her mouth
<bef> CHI turns her head towards door . CHI looks at door
MOT rearranges her legs so she is sitting cross-legged
CHI turns her head and looks at MOT
MOT puts her hands around the jack+in+the+box
MOT looks down at the jack+in+the+box
MOT moves the truck away with one hand while holding onto jack+in+the+box with the other
MOT pushes jack+in+the+box closer to CHI and grabs crank
MOT turns the crank which makes music
CHI continues to look at jack+in+the+box
MOT continues to turn the crank
<bef> MOT turns crank slower and slower and suddenly stops turning it
CHI continues to look at jack+in+the+box
CHI looks down at ball in her hands
MOT turns the crank which makes music
<bef> MOT stops turning crank . MOT grabs one of the clown's hands and moves it back and forth while holding on to its head with the other hand
MOT continues to move clown's hand back and forth
MOT stops moving clown's hand back and forth and inclines her head sideways
MOT puts one hand under her chin
MOT pushes jack+in+the+box closer to CHI
MOT moves clown's hand back and forth
MOT puts jack+in+the+box in the middle between her and CHI
MOT puts clown back in the box
CHI watches MOT put the clown back in the box
CHI grabs toy duck next to her
CHI looks at duck in her hand
<bef> CHI looks up at MOT . CHI looks down at ball between her legs
MOT picks up jack+in+the+box and puts it in front of her
<aft> MOT turns the crank which makes music
CHI looks at MOT and then at duck
CHI lets duck fall to the ground
MOT turns the crank which makes music
MOT points at clown then pulls hand away and puts it under her chin
MOT grabs both of the clown's hands and moves them back and forth
<aft> MOT inclines head to get a better look at clown
MOT straightens up and looks at CHI
CHI continues to look at clown
MOT holds onto both sides of the clown
CHI puts tip of ball in her mouth
MOT continues to clap clown's hands
MOT continues to look at CHI
MOT stops clapping clown's hands but holds them in her hands
CHI puts ball on the floor
CHI looks around on the floor
MOT leans over and tickles CHI's hand
<aft> CHI puts tip of ball in her mouth
<aft> MOT puts clown back in box and closes top
MOT picks up book . <aft> MOT holds book up in front of CHI
MOT points to item on cover of book . <aft> MOT looks at item on cover of book
CHI looks at item on cover of book
MOT moves book closer to CHI . <aft> MOT turns the first page which hits CHI's foot and closes
CHI still has the ball in her mouth
CHI looks at the open pages in front of her
<bef> CHI puts ball down in her lap
MOT moves ball so book can rest on it as well as on CHI's lap
MOT points to item on page
<aft> MOT pulls hand back and puts it under her chin
CHI looks at item on page
CHI looks at page . <aft> CHI looks to her left and then at book again
CHI taps at item in book with her right index finger
MOT reaches over and puts one hand on page . <aft> MOT turns page halfway then moves it back and forth a little
<aft> MOT leans head to the left to get a better look at CHI
CHI looks up at MOT then down at page
MOT pulls her hand back and puts it under her chin
CHI lets her finger tap lightly on page
CHI looks to her right then back at book
MOT picks up ball which is under the book
MOT holds ball in front of CHI
MOT pulls hand back and puts it under her chin
CHI puts tip of ball in her mouth
<bef> CHI takes ball out of her mouth
CHI puts tip of ball in her mouth
CHI looks at ball . <aft> CHI looks up at MOT
MOT puts hand under her chin
CHI takes ball out of her mouth and puts it on book
MOT pulls the jack+in+the+box closer to her
CHI puts tip of ball in her mouth
MOT turns crank the other way
CHI still has the ball in her mouth
MOT continues to turn the crank
CHI takes ball out of mouth
CHI continues to look at ball
CHI looks up at clown with a start
MOT turns the crank which makes music
<bef> MOT stopped turning the crank . MOT grabs one of the clown's hands and moves it back and forth
CHI looks at clown and then at door
INV explains Small Scale Activity to MOT and then puts the toys for the activity on the table and leaves room
CHI is sitting in a high chair at the table playing with the toys INV put out while MOT fills out forms
INV explains about Forbidden Object task to MOT while putting away all of the toys from the Small Scale Activity except a necklace
INV puts forbidden object on table
MOT is sitting next to CHI who is still in the high chair facing camera and INV is sitting across the table from them holding the forbidden object . CHI is holding a necklace in her hands
MOT leans head over toward CHI
CHI starts playing with necklace and then stretches her hands still holding necklace towards forbidden object
CHI puts necklace down on table in front of forbidden object and raises her hands
CHI touches chair with one hand and then reaches for necklace
CHI looks at chair then at necklace
MOT looks at CHI and nods head yes once
CHI continues to look at MOT
CHI looks up at object while holding necklace
<$=3> MOT looks at CHI and shakes head no
CHI looks at forbidden object then at necklace for a moment and then back at forbidden object
<aft> CHI lets necklace fall to the table
INV takes forbidden object off the table
INV explains about four PCI boxes to MOT then puts forbidden object away and puts out the boxes .
CHI sits quietly in high chair and watches INV . When MOT puts CHI on floor she crawls towards table
CHI is sitting on her knees at the table supporting herself on a chair while mother is standing in the middle of the room with the ball facing the camera
CHI kneels on the floor looking up at MOT
MOT is now sitting on floor holding the ball in front of her with both hands
MOT picks up CHI . <aft> MOT places CHI on the floor a little away from her
CHI's left side is facing the camera
MOT picks up ball and sits down across from CHI with legs apart
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI follows ball with her eyes
<aft> CHI touches ball with both hands
<bef> MOT reaches both hands out towards CHI and holds them outstretched with the palms up
MOT grabs ball when it reaches her outstretched hands and rolls it the rest of the way
<bef> MOT puts both hands behind ball
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI raises hands then puts both hands on the ball
CHI is moving hands up and down in the air
one hand hits ball and ball rolls in MOT's direction
CHI leans over and hits ball with one hand
ball rolls a little bit to the side
MOT stretches both arms out towards CHI
CHI stops banging her hand on the ball
CHI leans a little forwards and pushes ball a little closer to MOT with one hand
CHI looks at MOT's outstretched hands
MOT moves hands jerkily further and further back
<bef> MOT opens and closes both of her hands . MOT continues to open and close hands
CHI picks up ball with one hand and holds it out towards MOT
MOT puts her legs under her and holds arms stretched out towards CHI
MOT picks up ball with one hand
ball lands between CHI's legs and bounces over her left leg
CHI turns head to the left to see where ball went
CHI looks at ball for a little while then turns her head and looks at MOT
MOT gets up on her knees and reaches out for ball
MOT sits up on her knees and starts bouncing the ball
MOT leans over toward CHI and rolls ball to her
MOT sits back on her knees and puts her hands in her lap
CHI pays no attention to MOT and continues to play with ball
CHI bangs on ball with both hands
MOT stops playing with ball and straightens up
CHI hits ball with one hand
MOT grabs ball then rolls it to CHI and tickles ball
CHI leans over with the ball
MOT pushes ball closer to CHI and tickles ball
MOT grabs ball and pushes it towards CHI
<aft> MOT reaches out for ball with one hand
MOT tickles CHI with one hand . <aft> MOT rolls ball to CHI and sits back
CHI leans over and pushes ball away
MOT places ball in front of her
<aft> MOT picks up ball with one hand and holds the other one out to CHI
CHI puts one hand on MOT's thigh and starts to get up
MOT puts her hand over CHI's hand on thigh
MOT places ball between her knees
CHI stands up holding on to MOT's legs
CHI raises her arms and falls towards MOT
<bef> MOT grabs CHI . MOT lifts CHI upCHI: 0 .
MOT lets CHI sit on one of her arms and puts the other one around her
MOT pats CHI on her back
CHI is looking in the direction of the table and chair
MOT makes kissing noises on CHI's cheek
MOT puts CHI down on the floor
MOT picks up ball . <aft> MOT gets up
CHI follows MOT with her eyes

MOT goes over to the PCI boxes . Noises indicate that she is opening one of them . CHI watches her for a minute then starts crawling to the chair next to MOT which she uses as support to try to get up
she is holding the towel in one of her hands
<aft> MOT picks up CHI and places CHI on the floor next to chair
CHI looks at towel in MOT's hand
MOT sits down next to CHI
MOT unfolds towel . <aft> MOT holds the unfolded towel up in front of her so it hides all of her
MOT lowers towel until her nose is visible
MOT looks at CHI over the rim of the towel
MOT lowers towel until down below her face
CHI looks up at MOT for a moment then looks at the towel
MOT throws towel over CHI's head
towel hits CHI's face and slides down in her lap
pitch is higher than previous pitch
MOT throws towel over CHI's head
towel is over CHI's face and covers most of her body
MOT pronounces the last syllable at the same time CHI's head appears from under the towel . There is a somewhat frightened look on CHI's face
MOT moves head up and down once at her left side
MOT throws towel over CHI's face
CHI looks at MOT for a moment then at the towel which is halfway in her lap and halfway on her arm
CHI shrugs of the part of the towel that was on her arm
CHI takes the towel and holds it up over her head
part of CHI's head is covered
MOT leans torso to the right
CHI puts towel in her lap
MOT gives a little start and straightens up
CHI picks up towel and puts in on the floor next to her
MOT starts to lift the towel
<bef> MOT holds towel up in front of her so she is hidden behind it
CHI looks up and down the towel
<bef> MOT inclines her head to the left and peeks out from the blanket
<aft> MOT lowers towel until rim reaches her nose
CHI turns around and crawls toward chair where she stops and sits down looking up at the PCI boxes
MOT holds towel up in front of her face but quickly lowers it
MOT shakes head and looks at CHI
MOT holds up towel in front of her
CHI turns head around and looks at MOT
towel lands on CHI's front and covers half of her face
MOT picks up towel then throws towel over CHI head
most of CHI is hidden under towel
CHI starts to pull off towel
CHI pulls towel off her head entirely
CHI looks down at towel in her lap
CHI raises head and looks in the direction between the table and the dresser with the boxes
CHI looks up at the PCI boxes
CHI glances at MOT then looks at towel
MOT holds the towel up in front of her so she is all hidden by it
CHI looks up and down of towel
MOT holds up towel over her head
MOT lowers towel until its rim is below her face
MOT holds towel up in front of CHI so CHI is hidden behind it
MOT puts towel over CHI's head
MOT says peekaboo right as CHI's face appears from under the towel
CHI moves arms to get rid of towel which is lying over her shoulders
CHI is holding her arms up in the air
MOT lets her arms rest on her thighs
CHI grabs hold of MOT's blouse and tries to get up
MOT holds on to CHI with both hands
CHI holds on to MOT's blouse
CHI has back of head to camera
MOT lets go of CHI for a second
<bef> CHI gets up and holds on to MOT for support . CHI lets go of MOT's blouse
CHI looks in the direction of the waste basket
<bef> MOT looks in the same direction as CHI . MOT looks at CHI
MOT puts CHI down on the floor . <aft> MOT picks up towel and gets up
<bef> MOT folds the towel together . MOT puts towel away
CHI touches her face twice with her hand
MOT walks across the room then puts the towel in its box
CHI starts wriggling her hands and kicking her legs while sitting on the floor
MOT starts opening the next box
CHI turns her head around to the left
MOT removes the cover of another box on the desk
<aft> MOT starts looking through the pieces of paper in box
MOT goes through the papers in box
MOT continues to go through papers in box
CHI moves arms up and down
MOT puts papers down on floor in front of CHI
MOT sits down on floor next to CHI
MOT puts three crayons down on the paper . <aft> MOT pushes paper closer to CHI
MOT draws a wavy line on the top piece of paper
MOT looks at paper . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
MOT points at something in the lower right corner of paper
MOT makes wavy line on paper with her finger
CHI looks at crayon in her hand
CHI continues to look at crayon in her hand
MOT makes wavy line on the paper with her finger
MOT pushes a little bit of paper with two fingers
CHI bends over a little bit and draws a small line on the paper
<bef> MOT moves legs so she is sitting cross-legged
MOT bends over the piece of paper
MOT brushes something off the paper
<aft> MOT moves paper closer to CHI and moves CHI's leg out to the side
CHI looks from paper to crayon and then back at the paper again

g.ga: having the paper between CHI's open legs

u.a: MOT finishes rearranging CHI's legs and the paper
MOT grabs CHI's hand which is holding the crayon and moves it a little closer to the paper but stops
MOT rearranges the crayon on CHI's hand
<bef> MOT brings CHI's hand down to the piece of paper . MOT moves CHI hand across paper
MOT continues to draw with CHI's hand
CHI looks at crayon in her hand
CHI bends down a little and puts the crayon to the paper
CHI moves the crayon around on the paper
CHI moves crayon away from paper
CHI draws a line on the paper
MOT picks up the crayon which is still lying on the piece of paper and holds it up a little above the paper
MOT points to the paper then taps on it with a finger
CHI looks down while holding a crayon up in the air
MOT moves hand up and down on the paper along CHI's leg and lifts CHI's leg up to look under it
MOT finds lost crayon under her knee
MOT puts the crayon on the paper
CHI looks at one of the crayons in her hand then at the paper
CHI draws a small line on the paper
CHI drops one of the crayons she is holding in her hands
CHI follows the crayon with her eyes as it rolls a little bit away from her
CHI looks at crayon in her hand
CHI moves it from one hand to the other
MOT picks up the crayon CHI dropped
CHI looks at crayon MOT just put on the paper

g.ga: the crayon CHI has in her left hand

u.a: MOT points to crayon with finger
CHI puts the crayon she just picked up in her mouth
<3-4> MOT pulls CHI's hand out of CHI's mouth
MOT holds CHI's hand down a little then lets go of it
CHI continues to look at crayon
CHI puts the crayon she is holding in her other hand down on the paper
MOT holds up a crayon in front of CHI
CHI looks at the crayon MOT is holding
CHI looks at crayon then at paper
MOT points to paper with finger once
CHI lets crayon drop on paper
CHI reaches out for crayon between her legs
MOT reaches out for crayon that rolled away but pulls back hand
CHI picks up crayon and throws it on the paper
CHI picks up another crayon and throws it at where the first crayon landed
CHI picks up third crayon and throws it where the other two crayons are
one of the crayons rolls off the paper towards CHI
CHI looks at crayons on paper
CHI moves hand around on paper and one crayon rolls off
MOT picks crayon up and puts it on the paper
CHI pushes a crayon off the paper
MOT places crayon in CHI's hand
CHI watches MOT put the crayon into her hand
MOT wraps her hand around CHI's hand and draws with CHI's hand
MOT moves crayon back and forth faster and faster
MOT lets go of CHI's hand
CHI draws a line on paper
CHI looks at the crayons in her hand
CHI has a crayon in each hand
CHI leans torso towards MOT offering her a crayon with her outstretched arm
CHI follows crayon with her eyes
MOT puts two fingers around the crayon
CHI pulls hand back a little bit still holding onto crayon and then lets go of crayon and pulls hand all the way back
MOT holds crayon up in front of CHI . <aft> MOT moves crayon closer to CHI
CHI looks down at crayons in her hand
CHI looks at one crayon then at the other
<aft> MOT moves CHI's leg a little further to the side and then taps paper with one finger
CHI continues to look at the crayon
CHI holds crayon out towards MOT
<bef> MOT holds her hand under the crayon
MOT stops drawing and pulls hand away
CHI looks up at crayon in MOT's hand
CHI looks down at crayons in her hands
CHI bends over and puts both crayons down on the paper
CHI picks up third crayon and puts it with the others
MOT starts pulling out a new piece of paper from the pile on the floor
MOT pulls the piece of paper further out
MOT picks up a crayon that has rolled away . <aft> MOT puts crayon on the paper and moves her hand up behind CHI's head
CHI turns head around to see what MOT's hand is doing behind her head
MOT moves hand away from behind CHI's head
CHI looks at the crayon she picked up
CHI puts the two crayons in her hand down on the paper
CHI looks back over her left shoulder
CHI swings left arm back then puts crayon down next to herself and puts left hand behind her back
MOT bends over a little bit towards CHI
CHI puts left hand on the crayon next to her
CHI looks down at crayon . <aft> CHI looks at the paper
<aft> CHI picks up the crayon and holds it in her hand
CHI bangs leg down on the paper . <aft> CHI tries to move the papers away by pushing them with her feet
MOT puts hand behind CHI's back
MOT tries to get a grip on one of the papers
MOT gets hold of the piece of paper and moves it a little to the side
CHI pushes to another piece of paper with her foot
CHI's foot is resting on a corner of the paper and a ripping sound is heard as MOT tries to move paper
<aft> MOT lifts CHI's foot to pull paper away and places paper on top of the other piece of paper she moved . Then she moves the last paper away and puts it on top of the two others
<bef> CHI turns head to her left . CHI throws crayon she has in the hand on the floor
MOT lets crayon drop to the floor between CHI's legs
CHI looks down at crayon MOT threw
CHI spreads her legs further apart and picks up crayon
CHI looks at crayon she picked up then at the crayon in her other hand
CHI stretches hand holding one of the crayons towards MOT
MOT puts her hand under CHI's hand
CHI lets tip of crayon touch MOT's hand
MOT pulls the crayon closer to herself
MOT holds crayon up in front of CHI
<aft> MOT puts hand in her lap
CHI bends over and stretches out hand in which she is holding crayon trying to reach the pieces of paper
CHI puts crayon down on paper
<aft> CHI looks at crayon in her other hand
CHI turns torso to the right and throws crayon
CHI wiggles head . <aft> CHI reaches out for the crayon she placed on the pieces of paper
CHI looks at crayon behind her
CHI stretches out to reach crayon and picks it up
MOT pulls up legs and wraps her arms around them
CHI continues to look at MOT
MOT puts her legs down then leans over and puts hands in her lap
CHI looks down at MOT's knee
MOT reaches hand out towards CHI
CHI looks down at crayons in her hands
MOT continues to hold out her hand
CHI reaches over MOT's hand and drops a crayon on the floor
CHI follows crayon with her eyes
MOT looks down at crayon then at CHI
MOT draws on a piece of paper
MOT looks down at piece of paper
CHI turns all the way around
CHI is sitting in front of wastebasket with her back to camera
<aft> CHI moves hand holding crayon up and down in front of wastebasket touching the plastic bag in it

CHI looks to the other side

MOT places CHI in front of the pieces of paper
MOT reaches hand out toward CHI
CHI turns her back to MOT

<bef> MOT pulls hand back a little . MOT stretches arm out all the way and points to crayon
more forcefully than the previous time
